emailTemplate.name: PledgeConfirmation
emailTemplate.subject: TicketMuffin - Your pledge confirmation
emailTemplate.html:
Hi there,

Thanks for pledging to attend @Model.Event.Title!

Your order number is @Model.Pledge.OrderNumber. You can use this number if you ever need to contact us about your purchase.

Whenever you want to update your personal information, change your password or review your activity, you can browse here:
@Model.AccountPageUrl

Regards,

TicketMuffin
emailTemplate.text:
Hi @Model.Account.FirstName Thanks for pledging to attend @Model.Event.Title! You can review details of the event here: http://www.ticketmuffin.com/@Model.Event.ShortUrl
Your order number is @Model.Pledge.OrderNumber. You can use this number if you ever need to contact us about your purchase.
Whenever you want to update your personal information, change your password or review your activity, you can browse here: @Model.AccountPageUrl
Regards, TicketMuffin
